description: : Min space of SP must be  >= 0.356
:Min SP space on STI  <= 0.42um must be merge
: Min spacing of SP to a N+ active outside NW must be  >= 0.22
: Min spacing of SP to a N+ pick-up active(non-butted active) must be >= 0.084um  if the distance between N+active and NW >= 0.43um
: Min spacing of SP to a N+ pick-up active(non-butted active) must be >= 0.152um  if the distance between N+active and NW < 0.43um
: Min overlap from SP edge to an active must be  >= 0.194um
: Min overlap from SP edge to an active must be  >= 0.194um
: Min resist pattern area within PPLUS region must be  >= 0.64um2
